ing: 1 (14 ounce) can yellow and white corn, drained
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chiles, drained
1 (8 ounce) package shredded Mexican cheese blend
des: "I threw this together one Cinco De Mayo for a work potluck. Not only did everyone love it and ask for the recipe, but it won the office dip and salsa contest! Serve with tortilla chips."
ins: Stir the yellow and white corn, Mexican-style corn, sour cream, mayonnaise, green onion, green chiles, adobo seasoning, seasoned salt, chili powder, and minced garlic together in a bowl. Add the Mexican cheese blend, and stir until evenly mixed. Cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate overnight before serving.
